text:
We stumbled upon this and decided to visit this cafe as the cafe besides starts only at 2pm.

Probably a better option as the food taste good, so was the Honey Oat Latte. Besides food, one might also catch paws in actions, probably if they happened to be roaming around inside the separate area.

Note that this is the ONLY animal friendly cafe in Beauty World.

We visited one weekend morning after our hike nearby. Had their white ginger and peach tea and avocado smoothie. üëçüèª we like the ambience. We visited again one week later, for their breakfast and lava cake. Food is decent üëçüèª

The food is really high quality and I enjoyed my time here studying with my friends. They also allow animals here so it is really a very inclusive cafe and a purr-fect place for relaxation and productivity.
Very nice environment and friendly staff. Good to have your pet in the grooming area while you enjoy your meal!

Nice chill vibes at this cafe! You can also watch the cute meow meows from a distance.

Iced coffee: Was slightly towards the milky side but still decent!

Iced matcha: Too milky for my liking, can give it a miss.

Iced peach tea: I believe it‚Äôs ice shaken. It has a rather big serving. Quite refreshing but nothing to shout about
